Name: Hazy Shade Of Apple
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum cinnamon infused
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: “The basic idea for the Hazy Shade was to compose a sweet and sour balanced drink, based on BACARDÍ Carta Blanca and Martini Rosato, that interprets the DNA of a Daiquiri and adds the spicy flavours of the vermouth. To perfect this combination, I infused the BACARDÍ with a cinnamon stick for 24 hours. A little fresh lime, apple juice and vanilla sugar rounds it up and the pink pepper on top gives the drink a great after-taste.”
History: German BACARDÍ Legacy 2015 winning drink created by Dennis Wolf at Bar Raclette, Berlin, Germany.
